forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. East wind 6 to 9 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. South wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
